response.headline: Ultimate Guide to Vegetarian Restaurants in Seoul featuring favorite plant-based spots
response.summary: KrazyKlub shares their ultimate guide to vegetarian restaurants in Seoul, targeting vegetarians, flexitarians, and plant-based food lovers. The guide showcases Korean vegetarian dishes including what appears to be Korean-style cauliflower, pasta, and flatbread options.
